original_dialogue.patient: Recently, I am experiencing Acid reflux and Burning sensation behind the breastbone.
original_dialogue.doctor: Is it? Then do you experience Hard to swallow?
I believe you are having Esophagitis.

gpt3_output.patient: Recently, I am experiencing Acid reflux and Burning sensation behind the breastbone.

gpt3_output.doctor: Is it? Then do you experience Stomach ache?
Oh, do you have any Difficulty swallowing?

gpt3_output.patient: Yes, sometimes it is hard to swallow.
gpt3_output.doctor: Ok, this means you might be having Esophagitis.

issue: GPT-3 does not seem to have any issues with the diagnosis.
improvement: GPT3 is now able to question more precisely around the symptoms that a possible disease might have. In the above example, GPT-3 asks the patient if they have symptoms which are related to a disease that could have acid reflux as a symptom and thereby ends up making the right diagnosis.
